Package icyllis.arc3d.vulkan

package icyllis.arc3d.vulkan
Vulkan.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    VkBackendContext
    The VkBackendContext contains all the base Vulkan objects needed by the VulkanDevice.
    VkBackendFormat
     
    VkBackendRenderTarget
     
    VkBackendTexture
     
    VKCore
    Provides native interfaces of Vulkan 1.1 core and user-defined utilities.
    VulkanAllocation
    Holds Vulkan memory allocation information.
    VulkanBuffer
     
    VulkanCommandBuffer
     
    VulkanCommandPool
    VkCommandPool is created with a single primary command buffer and (optional) a set of secondary command buffers.
    VulkanDevice
     
    VulkanImageInfo
    When wrapping a BackendTexture or BackendRenderTarget, the VulkanImageInfo.mCurrentQueueFamily should either be VK10.VK_QUEUE_FAMILY_IGNORED, VK10.VK_QUEUE_FAMILY_EXTERNAL, or EXTQueueFamilyForeign.VK_QUEUE_FAMILY_FOREIGN_EXT.
    VulkanMemoryAllocator
    AMD vulkan memory.
    VulkanPrimaryCommandBuffer
     
    VulkanSharedImageInfo
     
    VulkanTexture
    Represents Vulkan 2D images, can be used as textures.
